text: cakShu#ShIq vA EqtE yaqj~jasyaq yadAjya#BAgauq yadAjya#BAgauq yaja#tiq cakShu#ShI Eqva tad-yaqj~jasyaq prati# dadhAti pUrvAqrddhE ju#hOtiq tasmA$t pUrvAqrddhE cakShu#ShI praqbAhu#g-juhOtiq tasmA$t praqbAhuqk cakShu#ShI dEvalOqkaM ~MvA aqgninAq yaja#mAqnO&nu# paSyati pitRulOqka(gm) sOmE#nOttarAqrddhE$ &gnayE# juhOti dakShiNAqrddhE sOmA#yaiqvami#vaq hImau lOqkAvaqnayO$ rlOqkayOqranu#KyAtyaiq rAjA#nauq vA Eqtau dEqvatA#nAqM - [  ]  8
